special_text:
You may cast spells from exile that have grail counters on them.
[+2]: Search you deck for a permanent card and exile it with a grail counter on it, shuffle. Draw a card. End the turn.
[-1]: Goetia, deals damage equal to the number of loyalty counters on it, to any target. If a creature dealt damage this way would be destroyed, exile it instead.
[+0]: Restart the game, leaving in exile all non-Aura permanent cards exiled with Goetia. Then put those cards onto the battlefield under your control. Only activate this ability if you control seven permanents with grail counters on them in exile.
